document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">grew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">small, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">surrounded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">tight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">early, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">stooping </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">night. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">afternoon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">evening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">deep </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">yellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">shortness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">dropped. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">winds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">went </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">out </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">martial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">ways, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">leaves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">obtained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">excuse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">November </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">hung </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">granite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">hat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">nail </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">plush. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The day grew small, surrounded tight
